translation.en: Good evening. I'm so happy to meet you.
translation.de: Guten Abend. Ich freue mich, Sie kennenzulernen.

translation.en: I've read my notes on you two, and…
[clears throat] seems like you've been living together for a little while.
translation.de: leben Sie schon eine ganze Weile zusammen.

translation.en: But guess what? I'm here to make sure that when you two lovebirds leave here today,
translation.de: Und am Ende unserer Sitzung werden Sie zwei Turteltäubchen

translation.en: that you'll be singing in perfect harmony,
just like Whitney and Bobby!
-Excuse me just a moment. -[Sasha chuckles]
I know there's a little age cavern,
but don't be afraid of a little skin-on-skin contact.
translation.de: müssen Sie vor körperlicher Nähe nicht zurückschrecken.

translation.en: Dad, I think she thinks we're dating each other.
translation.de: Dad, sie denkt, wir sind ein Paar.

translation.en: Impossible.
Please, go on.
I think that the wedge between you two is coming from a deeper place, Mr. Dixon.
translation.de: Die Entfremdung zwischen Ihnen hat eine tiefere Ursache, Mr. Dixon.

translation.en: What are you talking about? He's my dad.
translation.de: Was reden Sie? Er ist mein Dad.

translation.en: You know, calling somebody "Daddy"
can be part of a bigger sphere of intimacy, baby.
Well, I call this a bunch of bull.
And I call this already paid for.
translation.de: Den wir schon komplett bezahlt haben.

translation.en: Zip it.
How did we get here?
My daughter… I don't know how to connect with her.
translation.de: EINE WOCHE ZUVOR Ich will meiner Tochter nah sein.

translation.en: I've known you since high school, and I've known Sasha her whole life.
translation.de: Ich kenne dich seit der Schule und Sasha seit ihrer Geburt.

translation.en: You know what you two need? Therapy.
-Man, come on. -No, I got the perfect person.
And I know what you're gonna say.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was du sagen wirst.

translation.en: Black people don't go to therapy.
translation.de: Schwarze Menschen gehen nicht zur Therapie.

translation.en: [Sasha] My name is Sasha Dixon, and I live in Atlanta, Georgia.
translation.de: Ich heiße Sasha Dixon, und ich lebe in Atlanta, Georgia.

translation.en: Sadly, after my mom passed,
I came to live with my dad, Brian Dixon, down here in the A.
translation.de: musste ich hierher zu meinem Dad ziehen.

translation.en: He inherited his mom's cosmetics company, BAY Cosmetics,
translation.de: Er erbte die Kosmetikfirma seiner Mom, Bay Cosmetics.

translation.en: which stands for "Beverly and Young."
It's a new life for me,
translation.de: Das ist ein völlig neues Leben.

translation.en: getting reacquainted with my Pops, my favorite aunty, Chels,
translation.de: Ich lerne Pops, meine Lieblingstante Chelsea

translation.en: and my embarrassing Daddy.
translation.de: und meinen peinlichen Dad neu kennen.

translation.en: I really miss my old life.
But, hey, learning to function in our dysfunctional home
translation.de: Der Versuch, mich in unserer gestörten Familie zurechtzufinden,

translation.en: has gotten me to a place that I never thought I'd end up: therapy.
translation.de: brachte mir etwas ganz Unerwartetes ein: eine Therapie.

translation.en: So, tell me more about this living situation.
translation.de: Erzählen Sie mir von dieser Wohnsituation.

translation.en: Is there anything can be done to make you feel more…
translation.de: Gibt es etwas, das man tun kann, damit Sie sich

translation.en: I don't know, comfortable?
[scoffs] Well, for starters, my dad makes me really uncomfortable
translation.de: Zunächst einmal fühle ich mich unwohl, wenn mein Dad

translation.en: when he hangs around the thots.
Really?
Tell me more of your thoughts.
Not "thoughts," "thots."
The thots he's seeing.
I don't see my thoughts, I think my thoughts.
translation.de: Ich treffe mich nicht mit Gedanken. Ich denke sie.

translation.en: No, no, no. "Thots."
T-H-O-T. "Those hoes over there."
I see.
This is an…
open relationship.
What?
Brian, would you care to…
tell me more about your thots?
I would love to.
-Oh, Brian! -Yeah.
I just love your beautiful home.
You know, I could just stay here forever.
Oh. You know, get your pretty feet off my chair.
translation.de: Nimm deine hübschen Füße vom Sessel.

translation.en: You know, you can't stay here at all.
You know what? My daughter, she's coming to live with me.
translation.de: Weißt du, meine Tochter zieht zu mir.

translation.en: There is nothing sexier than a single dad raising a child.
translation.de: Nichts ist so sexy wie ein Dad, der sein Kind alleine großzieht.

translation.en: No?
No. When does she get here?
Oh, as a matter of fact, today.
You know… Look, I'm trying to create a stable household for her.
translation.de: Ich versuche, ihr ein stabiles Zuhause zu bieten.

translation.en: I can't have women running in and out of the house and things like that.
translation.de: Ohne Frauen, die hier ein- und ausgehen und so weiter.

translation.en: I got to get to the airport soon,
and I'm sure that you got somewhere you gotta be, right?
translation.de: und du hast doch sicher auch was vor, oder?

translation.en: Right! I sure do.
Right here in this palatial palace.
translation.de: Und zwar in diesem prunkvollen Palast.

translation.en: Now come on. I need a full house tour.
translation.de: Jetzt komm. Ich brauche eine ausgiebige Hausführung.

translation.en: Look, we can't go up there. I done left drawers all on the floor.
translation.de: Geht nicht. Oben liegt überall Unterwäsche rum.

translation.en: Great minds think alike.
[hesitating] But you work for me!
No, that's… Baby!
-What's in this room? -It's a bedroom, like any other room.
translation.de: -Was ist in dem Zimmer? -Es ist nur ein Schlafzimmer.

translation.en: [squealing] It's so beautiful!
[Brian] Back in the day,
I would have tried to knock all the spice off of that jerk chicken.
translation.de: …hätte ich die Kleine an Ort und Stelle vernascht.

translation.en: But I gotta be responsible. She works for me, for God's sake!
translation.de: Aber ich muss vernünftig sein. Sie arbeitet für mich!

translation.en: -[chuckles] Your bed is so comfy. -Yeah.
Yeah, I could just sleep here all night long.
translation.de: Ich könnte die ganze Nacht hier schlafen.

translation.en: Please don't.
I just want to show you my appreciation for making me a BAY model.
translation.de: Ich will dir dafür danken, dass ich für Bay modeln darf.

translation.en: Yeah, you know what? You could also show me appreciation,
translation.de: Weißt du was? Danken könntest du mir auch

translation.en: you know those gift cards from Popeyes?
Them sandwiches is hard to come by.
Well, actually, I did get you a gift.
translation.de: Ich hab tatsächlich ein Geschenk für dich.

translation.en: Something I think you'll really like.
"Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuter…"
What is this? Some jeggings?
[laughs] No, silly! They're skinny jeans.
translation.de: Nein, Dummkopf! Das sind enge Jeans.

translation.en: I think they'd look incredible on you.
They would?
-Ha, thank you. -No, thank you.
Now, come over here, zaddy.
There's one more way I want to show you how appreciative I am.
translation.de: Da gibt es noch etwas, das ich dir schenken will.

translation.en: [imitating Al Pacino] Just when I thought I was out, they pull me back in.
translation.de: Gerade, wo ich denke, ich bin draußen, ziehen die mich wieder rein.

translation.en: -[smoke alarm beeping] -[in normal voice] Saved by the bell.
Hey, uh, listen. I'm gonna go downstairs and check on the house,
translation.de: Hör zu, ich gehe nach unten und kontrolliere das Haus,

translation.en: make sure it ain't on fire, okay?
And hold these biker shorts.
I like to interject myself…
Excuse me, baby.
Let me get on in here.
I like to interject myself into the…
translation.de: Ich schalte mich gerne ein in den…

translation.en: the process that I put my patients through,
translation.de: In den Prozess, den meine Patienten durchlaufen.

translation.en: and I call this "hands-on therapy."
Some people call it a "threesome," but--
-Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Sasha] What?
-What? -She's my daughter!
That's my dad!
Well…
Let me blow these candles out, then.
translation.de: Dann blase ich die Kerzen aus.

translation.en: I totally got my chakras mixed up.
Misdiagnosed the aura in the room.
I kind of diagnosed that wrong.
-See? We can't even get this right. -We're supposed to do this.
translation.de: -Nicht mal das kriegen wir hin. -Wir müssen das tun.

translation.en: -No… -You have to respect me…
This was your idea for coming into therapy. I didn't want to come here--
translation.de: Die Therapie war deine Idee. Ich wollte nicht…

translation.en: -Hey! Hey! -Black people don't go to therapy!
Listen. All I'm saying is that I'm trying to connect with my daughter.
translation.de: Ich will eine Bindung zu meiner Tochter aufbauen.

translation.en: Black people don't go to therapy--
I understand. Black people don't go to therapy.
translation.de: Kapiert. Schwarze gehen nicht zur Therapie.

translation.en: We also don't mess over money.
But you're here, so let's try something.
translation.de: Versuchen wir was, wo Sie schon da sind.

translation.en: I mean, how are you supposed to help us?
translation.de: Wie wollen Sie uns denn helfen?

translation.en: -All you know is sex. -Yeah.
Well, as a father and daughter who are clearly not having sex with each other,
translation.de: Da Sie als Vater und Tochter offensichtlich keinen Sex haben,

translation.en: what is wrong with you? What's the problem with you two?
translation.de: was stimmt dann nicht mit Ihnen?

translation.en: [Brian] Pops! Pops, what are you doing?
It smells like a Snoop concert down here.
translation.de: Hier unten riecht es wie bei einem Snoop-Konzert.

translation.en: Why can't you be like every other father? Just get drunk and pass out.
translation.de: Warum besäufst du dich nicht wie andere Väter und pennst ein?

translation.en: I'm healing my body. This is medicinal.
translation.de: Ich heile meinen Körper. Das ist medizinisch.

translation.en: Yep. I told Pops to chill now that Sasha's gonna be living with us.
translation.de: Jetzt, wo Sasha zu uns kommt, soll Pops sich entspannen.

translation.en: Give me this!
We can't be smoking this stuff in front of the kids.
translation.de: Wir dürfen vor den Kindern nicht kiffen.

translation.en: You guys should really chill it with the weed.
translation.de: Macht lieber langsam mit dem Gras.

translation.en: You brought it to us, dumbass!
It's not mine. I got it from the evidence locker.
If we smoke it all up, ain't gonna be no evidence left.
translation.de: Wenn wir es aufrauchen, gibt es keine Beweise mehr.

translation.en: Besides, you know Sasha's already 15.
You think your daughter doesn't know what weed is?
translation.de: Denkst du, sie weiß nicht, was Gras ist?

translation.en: It's 2019, for God's sake.
It's 2021, for God's sake.
Goddamn, that's some good shit.
Hey, Manny. Manny, what are you doing?
translation.de: Hey, Manny, was machst du da?

translation.en: I'm just checking the smoke alarms, Mr. Brian.
translation.de: Ich überprüfe die Rauchmelder, Mr. Brian.

translation.en: They work.
[gasps] Speaking of alarms,
I was supposed to respond to a home invasion, like, a half hour ago.
translation.de: ich müsste längst bei einem Hausfriedensbruch sein.

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll be right back.
Y'all know Sasha's supposed to be here in three hours.
translation.de: Sasha wird in drei Stunden hier sein.

translation.en: -[Sasha] Hello? -Sasha!
Damn! Those few hours just flew by.
Is it still 2021?
Come on.
My baby's home! Oh, so good to see you.
translation.de: Meine Kleine ist daheim! Wie schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: What are you doing here? You know you're supposed to land at 9:00.
translation.de: Was tust du hier? Du solltest um 21:00 Uhr landen.

translation.en: My flight landed early. You'd know if you checked your texts.
translation.de: Der Flug kam früher an. Liest du deine SMS nicht?

translation.en: My texts? Let me check my texts.
If I check the texts, if I…
Thirty-seven missed texts. I gotta clean this up.
translation.de: Siebenunddreißig SMS. Ich muss Ordnung machen.

translation.en: You know what? You probably texting the landline.
translation.de: Sicher hast du sie ans Festnetz geschickt.

translation.en: Plus, I'm a grown-ass man. You gotta call me.
translation.de: Ich bin erwachsen. Du musst anrufen.

translation.en: -[Sasha] Aunt Chelsea! -Hi!
Oh, my gosh! Look at you, growing up so fast.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott! Wie bist du groß geworden.

translation.en: You know, I texted you, too.
That was you?
[exclaims] I was like, "Whose damn number is this?"
translation.de: Ich hab die Nummer nicht erkannt.

translation.en: But you kept calling, so I had to block you in case you was a bill collector.
translation.de: Ich habe sie gesperrt, falls es das Inkassobüro ist.

translation.en: I'd hug you but I don't want to get a contact high.
translation.de: Wenn ich dich umarme, werde ich auch high.

translation.en: See? She knows about weed.
Dad, I think I'm gonna go upstairs and crash.
translation.de: Ich geh nach oben und leg mich hin.

translation.en: "Upstairs and crash"?
Wait a minute!
You know what? These bags are so sturdy, and they slippery as hell.
translation.de: Diese Koffer sind so massiv und unglaublich glatt.

translation.en: Look, you know what?
Check to make sure the TSA didn't take something out your bag.
translation.de: Schau lieber nach, ob nichts fehlt.

translation.en: I gotta go clean up right quick.
Courtney, we got a code red.
What? What are you… Where are your clothes?
On the floor somewhere.
Why don't you put 'em on?
Okay, listen, a meeting just came up, so I gotta go.
translation.de: Ich hab ein Meeting, ich muss jetzt los.

translation.en: I gotta get you out of here.
As a matter of fact, why don't you go out the window?
translation.de: Warum steigst du nicht aus dem Fenster?

translation.en: [Courtney] What?
Please just go out the window.
-Look, you like to play games, right? -Yeah.
Why don't we play tie the sheets together, and we play prison break? Huh?
translation.de: Dann knoten wir die Laken aneinander und spielen Gefängnisausbruch.

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about, but go to your meeting.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wovon du redest, aber geh zu deinem Meeting.

translation.en: I'll be here waiting for you.
-No, baby, you gotta go. -No, you gotta stay.
-[Brian] No, you gotta go. -You gotta stay.
-[Brian] No, you gotta go. -Dad, I need some towels!
And she needs some clothes.
No, Sash. We're… We was…
She works for me. She's just working for me right now.
translation.de: Sie arbeitet für mich. Jetzt gerade arbeitet sie für mich.

translation.en: Tell me, how did it make you feel, baby, to find Daddy in a compromising position?
translation.de: Wie war es für dich, deinen Dad in einer so kompromittierenden Lage vorzufinden?

translation.en: Not happy at first. Then I figured it would be nice to know someone
translation.de: Zuerst mies. Aber es war ein Vorteil, dass sie jung genug war,

translation.en: young enough to have a TikTok account.
Sasha, I'm not gonna go over this anymore. I am not seeing her.
translation.de: Ich wärme das nicht wieder auf. Wir sind kein Paar.

translation.en: And you watch your sauciness in your voice, okay? I'm your father.
translation.de: Und sei nicht so frech, ja? Ich bin dein Vater.

translation.en: [chuckles] "Father" or babysitter?
Yes, yes. Let's explore that.
translation.de: Ja. Sehen wir uns das genauer an.

translation.en: You feel like your father's not invested in your life?
translation.de: Du meinst, dein Dad engagiert sich nicht?

translation.en: Exactly. You know, I feel like I'm never a priority for him.
translation.de: Genau. Ich bin für ihn einfach keine Priorität.

translation.en: What?
-[exclaims] Jesus! -I thought you was trying to battle, girl.
What are you even doing here?
I just got through dropping off Courtney.
Oh, good. You got her back before her curfew.
Funny. What was you listening to? Some Beyoncé? Some Jay-Z?
translation.de: Witzig. Was hast du dir angehört? Beyoncé? Oder Jay-Z?

translation.en: [imitating Jay-Z] It's crazy. It's the ROC. Started out of Marcy Projects. [chuckles]
translation.de: Verrückt. Hier ist der Roc. Aus den Sozialbauten hierher.

translation.en: No. I was listening to J Balvin.
translation.de: Nein. Ich hab J Balvin gehört.

translation.en: He's my favorite artist.
[in normal voice] Yes. J Balvin in the hizzouse.
[chuckles] J. My good old boy, J.
-You have no idea who that is, do you? -Yes, I do not.
translation.de: -Du kennst ihn nicht, oder? -Ja, ich kenne ihn nicht.

translation.en: Look, I was thinking, this weekend, Sash,
how about we go to the happiest place on Earth?
translation.de: zum schönsten Ort der Welt gehen, oder?

translation.en: Or as I call it, the mouse in the hizzou…
translation.de: Oder, wie ich sage, die coolste Maus…

translation.en: -Damn. -Please! Disney World is for kids.
And by the way, last time you cried on Space Mountain.
translation.de: Letztes Mal hast du im Space Mountain geweint.

translation.en: I ain't cry. The kid in the front had a churro and popped me in my eye.
translation.de: Das Kind vor mir stieß mir mit einer Zuckerstange ins Auge.

translation.en: Are we still rolling with that?
Anyway, look, we can go anywhere you want to go, all right?
translation.de: Wir können gehen, wohin du willst.

translation.en: We hang out. Except for Twin Peaks.
Courtney's mom works there, late-night shift.
Well, what about that sushi place we used to go to?
translation.de: Wie wäre es mit diesem Sushi-Restaurant?

translation.en: Hmm, I don't know about the sushi.
Remember last time? You had the food poisoning.
translation.de: Das ist dir letztes Mal nicht bekommen.

translation.en: You know, you had the bubbles.
The whole bathroom was like a Jackson Pollock.
translation.de: Das Bad sah aus wie ein Jackson Pollock.

translation.en: I mean, it wasn't that bad.
And plus, those sweaty palms nursed me back to health.
-Oh, yeah, yeah. -Come on, we can go tomorrow night.
No, can't go tomorrow.
We're having a little pop-up for BAY, for the investors, trying to get money.
translation.de: Bay veranstaltet ein Pop-up-Event für die Investoren.

translation.en: We're going to have soda pop, Pop-Tarts, Pops is gonna be there.
translation.de: Es gibt Popcorn, Pop-Tarts, und Pops kommt auch.

translation.en: It's gonna be popping.
And you're an intern, so you need to get there and pop it off.
translation.de: Und du als Praktikantin solltest auch dabei sein.

translation.en: Right. Work comes first.
translation.de: Richtig. Die Arbeit steht an erster Stelle.

translation.en: No, I'm not saying that.
What I'm saying is…
how about we go, do our thing there at the pop-up,
translation.de: Wir zeigen uns kurz beim Pop-up

translation.en: and then dip off and go to the sushi restaurant?
translation.de: und verdrücken uns dann ins Restaurant.

translation.en: Only this time, if you're feeling sick, know what you're supposed to do?
translation.de: Wenn dir schlecht wird, weißt du, was du tun musst.

translation.en: I know. Make a big scene so dinner's on the house.
translation.de: Theater machen, dann geht das Essen aufs Haus.

translation.en: If you followed my lead, if you would've fell in Dave & Buster's,
translation.de: Wärst du wie ich bei Dave & Buster's gestürzt,

translation.en: Dave & Buster's would be Sasha's & Brian right now.
translation.de: würde es jetzt Sasha's & Brian heißen.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Dad, hurry up! -[Brian] I'm coming!
What you…
-Oh, hell, no! -Oh, hell, no!
What are you wearing?
What do you mean, what am I wearing? I'm wearing the latest skinny jean.
translation.de: Was ich anhabe? Die neuesten engen Jeans.

translation.en: Those jeans aren't skinny, they're starving.
translation.de: Eng? Die schnüren dir das Blut ab.

translation.en: They fit. I've just got to break them in.
What are you talking about? Look at your dress.
translation.de: Und du? Sieh dir dein Kleid an.

translation.en: That dress should have came with a pregnancy scare.
translation.de: Da sollte eine Schwangerschaftswarnung drauf sein.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Don't. Hey, don't film… Don't film me.
Don't film me. Sash. Huh?
I'm gonna put this on my TikTok.
Put this on TikTok?
Oh, my God. Dad, are you okay?
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Dad, alles ok?

translation.en: Baby, I'm not.
Just know that you're gonna be an only child.
-Let's just get to the party. -Okay.
[grunts] Sash?
I need a little help, Sash.
Sash?
Playa, welcome to BAY pop-up.
Pop-up? This looks more like a little get-together to me.
translation.de: Pop-up? Wohl eher ein Treffen im kleinen Kreis.

translation.en: When the other people gonna pop up?
It hasn't started yet. Plus, a pop-up just refers to a temporary location.
translation.de: Es hat noch nicht angefangen. Pop-up bezieht sich auf den temporären Ort.

translation.en: All right. Okay.
Yeah, I think something just popped up.
Excuse me, snowflake?
Cottontail?
Listen, would you like to buy me a drink?
translation.de: Möchtest du mir einen Drink ausgeben?

translation.en: -Pops still got it, man. -Brian.
-Hey! -Stace. [exclaims]
-Hi… Sasha! -[Sasha] Hi!
Oh, it's been so long.
Why is your dad wearing your jeans?
translation.de: Warum trägt dein Dad deine Jeans?

translation.en: Oh. No, those are way too small to be mine.
translation.de: Nein, die wären mir viel zu klein.

translation.en: Hey, Bri-Bri!
Oh! Hey. How are you doing?
You look so snatched in those jeans I got you.
translation.de: In den Jeans, die ich dir schenkte, siehst du heiß aus.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I don't… It's…
This is crazy, but I'm just trying to stay tight.
translation.de: Irre, aber ich versuche, hip zu bleiben.

translation.en: Look, there's Stacy.
-Hi. -Stacy, this is Courtney.
Stacy is the key to all this. She's the backbone of BAY.
translation.de: Stacy hat das alles für Bay auf die Beine gestellt.

translation.en: She put all this together. Oh! I hear my music.
translation.de: Sie hat alles organisiert. Ich höre meine Musik.

translation.en: There goes that old-school music. That's my song right there.
translation.de: Richtig schön oldschool. Das ist mein Song.

translation.en: Yo, Sash…
[exclaims] Get this on your TikTok.
I don't want to lose any followers.
Your dad is so cute.
Puppies are cute.
He's embarrassing.
Well, you know, my son does run this whole company.
translation.de: Mein Sohn leitet dieses ganze Unternehmen.

translation.en: And I am his daddy, so, when you think about it,
translation.de: Und ich bin sein Vater. Daraus folgt,

translation.en: all of this is really 'cause of me.
translation.de: dass mir das alles zu verdanken ist.

translation.en: Nothing?
All right, let me reload, try to shoot again.
translation.de: Noch mal von vorne. Neuer Versuch.

translation.en: You know, um…
I'm also Justin Bieber's daddy.
translation.de: Ich bin auch Justin Biebers Dad.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I knew he sounded mixed.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott. Ich wusste es. Er klingt so gemischtrassig.

translation.en: Right? [chuckles]
-He took his mama's last name, though. -No.
But I don't like to brag. [shushes]
What in the double-stuffed Oreos is going on here?
translation.de: Was um Himmels willen geht hier vor sich?

translation.en: Oh. We're roleplaying.
She's about to depants the police.
translation.de: Sie zieht der Polizei die Hosen aus.

translation.en: [both] Shut up, Johnny!
Look, I came in here to get my business cards,
translation.de: Ich bin wegen meiner Visitenkarten hier,

translation.en: not to find you giving my sister the business.
translation.de: nicht, um zu sehen, wie du meine Schwester anmachst.

translation.en: Well, you said it was a pop-up.
translation.de: Du sagtest doch, es ist ein Pop-up.

translation.en: I thought y'all hated each other.
We do.
But that's what makes it so hot.
translation.de: Aber das macht es ja so heiß.

translation.en: Brian? Matt's here with the investors and…
translation.de: Brian? Matt ist hier mit den Investoren…

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. -What did I just walk into?
A private moment no one was supposed to see.
-Got it. -I'll be out there in a sec.
Well, nice knowing you, Johnny. She's like a black widow.
translation.de: Hat mich gefreut, Johnny. Sie ist eine schwarze Witwe.

translation.en: When she's done with her partner,
translation.de: Wenn sie mit dir fertig ist,

translation.en: she eats 'em.
-What? -Relax.
[Brian] Cash Money Matt. What up, baby?
translation.de: Cash Money Matt. Wie geht's, Kumpel?

translation.en: Good to see you. Hey, look, lemme ask you something.
translation.de: Schön, dich zu sehen. Ich muss dich was fragen.

translation.en: Whatever happened to that blond girl you used to hang out with?
translation.de: Was ist mit der Blondine passiert, mit der du abhingst?

translation.en: -She set everything on fire… -Yeah.
-What happened to that psycho? -Trish?
-Yeah, Trish. -We got married.
You know what? I knew you guys were crazy about each other.
translation.de: Ich wusste, dass ihr total verliebt wart.

translation.en: -I knew that was your soulmate. -Yeah.
I am excited to meet the investors.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf die Investoren.

translation.en: Great, 'cause they're over there. From Korea, and excited about this pop-up.
translation.de: Die sind dort drüben. Koreaner, die das Pop-up klasse finden.

translation.en: They want to go to dinner later to talk about the details--
translation.de: Sie wollen bei einem Essen die Details…

translation.en: Sorry, but unfortunately Brian already has a dinner appointment.
translation.de: Brian ist zum Essen leider schon verplant.

translation.en: Look, how about tomorrow night, okay?
translation.de: Wie wäre es dann morgen Abend?

translation.en: Because tonight we're gonna chill.
I already got the DJ poppin'.
translation.de: Der DJ ist schon auf Touren.

translation.en: We gonna have this place on fire.
-Give my regards to your girl. -I will. But this has to be tonight.
translation.de: -Grüß deine Frau. -Wir müssen das heute erledigen.

translation.en: They go back to Seoul tomorrow. You need the investors.
translation.de: Sie reisen morgen ab. Du brauchst sie.

translation.en: -Come on. -Okay. Let's do it.
Take care of it. We'll get the money.
translation.de: Kümmere dich drum. Wir kriegen das Geld.

translation.en: I need you to take Sasha over to the sushi restaurant, right?
translation.de: Du musst mit Sasha zum Sushi-Restaurant gehen, ja?

translation.en: And then I will meet you afterwards. We gotta get that money.
translation.de: Wir treffen uns dann. Wir müssen uns das Geld sichern.

translation.en: -Okay. Ah, what's going on here? -These pants.
I think one of my arteries is blocked.
-Makes sense. -Hey, Sash, sweetheart.
All right, come on.
So, Stace is gonna take you over to the sushi restaurant.
I'm gonna wine-and-dine these guys, get their money. I'll meet you later.
translation.de: Ich kümmere mich um das Geld und treffe euch später.

translation.en: So, no sushi?
Oh, yeah. For sure. I'll be there later. I promise, okay?
translation.de: Oh doch. Natürlich. Ich komme nach. Versprochen, ok?

translation.en: Just like you promised to pick me up from the airport?
translation.de: So wie du versprachst, mich vom Flughafen abzuholen?

translation.en: Stop bringing up old stuff.
Y'all from South Korea or North Korea?
translation.de: Sind Sie aus Süd- oder Nordkorea?

translation.en: All right.
I'm sorry your dad didn't make it to dinner.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass dein Dad nicht kam.

translation.en: Do you want some ice cream? Hmm?
Hey, hey, hey, that's mine, now.
I got the munchies in the Uber when the driver refused to stop at the DQ.
translation.de: Ich hab Hunger. Der Uber-Fahrer wollte mich nicht zu Dairy Queen fahren.

translation.en: Now, how hard is it to make a U-turn on I-75?
translation.de: Was ist so schwer daran, auf der I-75 zu wenden?

translation.en: You know, Pops, I'm surprised you even know what Uber is.
translation.de: Pops, ich wundere mich, dass du Uber kennst.

translation.en: Oh, no, he doesn't.
He just gets in people's cars and yells at them to take him home.
translation.de: Er steigt einfach irgendwo ein und will heimgefahren werden.

translation.en: Well, it's all very confusing.
I don't know why they call it UberPool, ain't no water in it.
translation.de: Warum heißt es UberPool? Ist gar kein Wasser drin.

translation.en: I rode for 45 minutes in a Speedo.
translation.de: Ich bin 45 Minuten in einer Badehose gefahren.

translation.en: My ass was itching.
You know, I thought this time would be different.
translation.de: Ich dachte, diesmal wäre es anders.

translation.en: But it's the same as always where I'm never a priority for him.
translation.de: Aber wie immer bin ich nicht seine Priorität.

translation.en: Like last year, when I had that science fair
and he FaceTimed in from a club.
Well, you did get to see DJ Khaled.
translation.de: Immerhin bekamst du DJ Khaled zu sehen.

translation.en: -How'd it go with the investors? -It was great. And, you know, they…
translation.de: -Wie lief es mit den Investoren? -Super. Und sie…

translation.en: They thought I looked so much like Obama, so I had to hit 'em like…
translation.de: Sie fanden, ich sehe Obama ähnlich. Da sagte ich:

translation.en: [imitating Obama] "And if there's any indication
that an investment in BAY is an investment in America,
translation.de: dass eine Investition in Bay eine Investition in Amerika ist,

translation.en: Sasha, Malia, Bo, they can all work."
translation.de: können Sasha, Malia und Bo alle mitarbeiten.

translation.en: "Yes, we can."
Okay. Well, when the Obama starts, I gotta go.
translation.de: Wenn er mit Obama anfängt, muss ich gehen.

translation.en: Have a good night.
See you later.
[in normal voice] They really loved that impression. Did you like it?
translation.de: Sie fanden mich als Obama toll. Und du?

translation.en: Hey, look, Sash…
I really apologize for not making it,
but things went great. And we could go tomorrow.
translation.de: aber es lohnte sich. Wir holen das morgen nach.

translation.en: [scoffs] Whatever. Can't wait to see what excuse you come up with next.
translation.de: Wie du meinst. Bin gespannt auf deine nächste Ausrede.

translation.en: "Excuse"? First of all, who you talking to?
translation.de: "Ausrede"? Weißt du, mit wem du sprichst?

translation.en: You know, it's always something with you.
translation.de: Es ist immer irgendwas, weißt du?

translation.en: You left me at the airport, you couldn't take me to dinner.
translation.de: Kein Abholen vom Flughafen, kein Restaurant.

translation.en: -Do you even want me here? -What?
Maybe you and I are like your pants and we just don't fit.
translation.de: Vielleicht sind wir wie deine Hose und passen nicht.

translation.en: You don't like my pants?
Sash, come on, now.
-You're overreacting. You know me. -"Overreacting."
You know, you're right, I do know you.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Ich kenn dich tatsächlich.

translation.en: People seem to like you. They think you're a fun guy. But--
translation.de: Du bist beliebt und unterhaltsam. Aber…

translation.en: But what?
You're just not a good dad.
Sa… Sash, come on. Sash. Sash!
Come down here.
I'll take the pants off.
You know what? Back in the day, if I would have said that to my parents,
translation.de: Wisst ihr was? Hätte ich das früher zu meinen Eltern gesagt,

translation.en: I would be waking up in ICU, wondering where my kidney was.
translation.de: würde ich im Krankenhaus aufwachen und mich fragen, wo meine Niere ist.

translation.en: But… this ain't back in the day.
I think I gotta fix this one.
[sighs] Dad, what's going on? I was still sleeping.
translation.de: Dad, was ist los? Ich hab noch geschlafen.

translation.en: -This is why you need to fix my lock. -You lucky you got a door.
translation.de: -Du musst das Schloss reparieren. -Sei froh über die Tür.

translation.en: Look, just stand right here, okay?
And don't move until I count to three.
translation.de: Beweg dich nicht, bis ich bis drei gezählt habe.

translation.en: What the…
Oh, my God! That's J Balvin!
translation.de: Oh mein Gott! Das ist J Balvin!

translation.en: -Dad, that was awesome! -Yeah, baby.
I mean, even your dancing was a little…
But you sounded great. How did you even remember J Balvin was my favorite artist?
translation.de: Du klangst super. Du hast dich daran erinnert, dass ich J Balvin mag.

translation.en: You know what? I've been taking my omega-3s.
And not only that, but Manny's ringtone is J Balvin,
so we cooked something up.
translation.de: also dachten wir uns das aus.

translation.en: And I want you to know that I love you,
translation.de: Weißt du, ich hab dich lieb,

translation.en: and I'm just trying to make sure that our relationship… is tight.
translation.de: und ich wünsche mir, dass unsere Beziehung eng ist.

translation.en: I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.de: Was ich sagte, tut mir leid.

translation.en: Ah, don't worry about it. It's just like how people say I can't dance,
translation.de: Schon gut. Viele sagen, ich tanze schlecht

translation.en: or I don't know how to dress. But I think I look good, right? Huh?
translation.de: und zieh mich nicht gut an. Aber ich gefalle mir.

translation.en: But I just want to let you know that, from now on…
translation.de: Du sollst wissen, dass es von nun an

translation.en: nothing is more important than you, Sash.
Not even BAY.
-What about Disney World? -Ah! Don't push it.
All right, now.
That was real nice, what you did for Sasha.
translation.de: Das war sehr schön, was du für Sasha getan hast.

translation.en: But I still think the end could have used more harmonica, man.
translation.de: Aber mehr Mundharmonika am Ende wäre besser gewesen.

translation.en: All I know is I'm in the mood for some Chipotle.
translation.de: Ich hab jetzt Lust auf Mexikanisch.

translation.en: That's racist.
But I'll drive.
[in Spanish] I'll bring you tacos, guys.
-[in English] Hey, B. -Talk to me, Matt.
The investors had a great time last night.
-I knew they would. I killed it! -They loved you.
Oh, man. Good. So we in the money.
translation.de: Prima. Also haben wir das Geld.

translation.en: -They're not going to invest. -Not gonna invest? Why not?
They just don't believe in BAY's business plan.
translation.de: Der Business-Plan hat sie nicht überzeugt.

translation.en: Plus, they found out you weren't actually related to Obama, so…
translation.de: Und sie wissen, dass du nicht mit Obama verwandt bist.

translation.en: Hold on a second. Hey. What's up, baby?
translation.de: Warte kurz. Hallo, was ist los, Schatz?

translation.en: What? Trish, we…
Goddamn, we talked about this!
I gotta go.
Gotta put out another fire. It's the third one this week.
translation.de: Ich muss mal wieder ein Feuer löschen.

translation.en: Make sure she drop and roll, man.
translation.de: Hinwerfen und auf dem Boden rollen.

translation.en: In my expert opinion,
y'all don't need therapy.
What y'all need to do is bond.
You need to get to know each other, spend more time with each other and grow.
translation.de: Ihr müsst euch besser kennenlernen, Zeit miteinander verbringen.

translation.en: When I work with couples, there's always a leader and a follower.
translation.de: Bei Paaren gibt immer einer die Richtung vor und der andere folgt.

translation.en: Sometimes he'll lead and you'll follow,
translation.de: Manchmal führt er und du folgst,

translation.en: sometimes you'll lead and he'll follow.
translation.de: manchmal führst du und er folgt.

translation.en: It's all about love, honey. Here, come walk this way.
translation.de: Die Liebe ist die Hauptsache. Komm her.

translation.en: I want you to go outside here,
and I want you to have a seat in the lobby,
and think about the stuff I've talked about.
translation.de: und denk über das Besprochene nach.

translation.en: I'm gonna talk to your dad about the bill, okay?
translation.de: Ich regle das Finanzielle mit deinem Dad.

translation.en: It was really a pleasure working with you. Now, you…
translation.de: Es war schön, mit dir zu arbeiten. Nun zu Ihnen…

translation.en: There's about seven minutes left on the clock.
translation.de: Wir haben noch etwa sieben Minuten.

translation.en: I don't want you to waste your money.
Last I checked,
this couch was a pullout, so…
translation.de: kann man das Sofa ausziehen, also…
